p: To illustrate a chimeric construct with the LRR 5 from murine Anp32B in murine Anp32A we created a homology model of MusB obtained using iTASSER structural prediction software (based primarily on huANP32B [GenBank accession number 2RR6A], huANP32A [accession number 2JQDA], and 2JEOA). The three-dimensional structural model was visualized and created in UCSF Chimera; the LRR is shown in dark gray and the structurally unresolved LCAR in semitransparent gray. Amino acid residues 128 to 153 are highlighted in blue and residue 130 is in red stick format.
